title: The humble request of His Majesties loyall subjects, the governour and the company late gone for Nevv-England to the rest of their brethren, in and of the Church of England. For the obtaining of their prayers, and the removall of suspitions, and misconstructions of their intentions.
author: Winthrop, John, 1588-1649, attributed name.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed [by Miles Flesher] for Iohn Bellamie,
